General.Name: Kiattana Transport Public Company Limited
General.Description: Kiattana Transport Public Company Limited provides transportation services in Thailand and internationally. The company offers integrated logistics services to the energy, chemical, and related industries through a fleet of trucks. It also provides warehousing, product sourcing, customs clearance and documentation, transportation management, and goods custodial services, as well as trades in chemicals used in industry. In addition, the company distributes and rents hardware and software accessories relating to IT systems and various types of global positioning systems; and offers rail freight services. Further, it provides rental of cars and tanks, and accessories installation services. The Company was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.
